full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Warehouse Shelving and Installation Services**
=====================================

**Reference:** WS3985653429

**Solicitation Number:** WS3985653429-Doc3985664099

**Request Number:** W3162-23F002

**Amendment Number:** Revision 3 of the solicitation

**Publication Date:** May 18, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 29, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Tender Status:** Exired (no longer accepting proposals)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of warehouse shelving and installation services.

**Scope:** This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the supply of pallet racking and shelving systems with options for installations and supplementary racking bays. The delivery and services are required in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Specifications:**

* UNSPSC: 24102000 (Shelving and storage)
* Regions of Opportunity: Montreal, Quebec, Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Luc Brunet (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16322249?extsite=MTYzMjIyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16322249?extsite=MTYzMjIyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on June 29, 2023. Note that bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
